p: To understand whether z-guggulsterone induces gastric cancer cell apoptosis, we performed Annexin V/PI staining following treatment with z-guggulsterone in both cells. The results showed that z-guggulsterone dose-dependently induced SGC-7901 apoptosis ( Figure 2(a)), while GES-1 cells were only minimally affected by incubation with 75 µM z-guggulsterone ( Figure 2(b)).
